00030 #include "SDL_framerate.h"
00031 
00040 void SDL_initFramerate(FPSmanager * manager)
00041 {
00042         /*
00043         * Store some sane values 
00044         */
00045         manager->framecount = 0;
00046         manager->rate = FPS_DEFAULT;
00047         manager->rateticks = (1000.0f / (float) FPS_DEFAULT);
00048         manager->baseticks = SDL_GetTicks();
00049         manager->lastticks = manager->baseticks;
00050 }
00051 
00063 int SDL_setFramerate(FPSmanager * manager, Uint32 rate)
00064 {
00065         if ((rate >= FPS_LOWER_LIMIT) && (rate <= FPS_UPPER_LIMIT)) {
00066                 manager->framecount = 0;
00067                 manager->rate = rate;
00068                 manager->rateticks = (1000.0f / (float) rate);
00069                 return (0);
00070         } else {
00071                 return (-1);
00072         }
00073 }
00074 
00084 int SDL_getFramerate(FPSmanager * manager)
00085 {
00086         if (manager == NULL) {
00087                 return (-1);
00088         } else {
00089                 return ((int)manager->rate);
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00103 int SDL_getFramecount(FPSmanager * manager)
00104 {
00105         if (manager == NULL) {
00106                 return (-1);
00107         } else {
00108                 return ((int)manager->framecount);
00109         }
00110 }
00111 
00123 Uint32 SDL_framerateDelay(FPSmanager * manager)
00124 {
00125         Uint32 current_ticks;
00126         Uint32 target_ticks;
00127         Uint32 the_delay;
00128         Uint32 time_passed;
00129 
00130         /*
00131         * No manager, no delay
00132         */
00133         if (manager == NULL)
00134                 return 0;
00135 
00136         /*
00137         * Initialize uninitialized manager 
00138         */
00139         if (manager->baseticks == 0) {
00140                 SDL_initFramerate(manager);
00141         }
00142 
00143         /*
00144         * Next frame 
00145         */
00146         manager->framecount++;
00147 
00148         /*
00149         * Get/calc ticks 
00150         */
00151         current_ticks = SDL_GetTicks();
00152         time_passed = current_ticks - manager->lastticks;
00153         manager->lastticks = current_ticks;
00154         target_ticks = manager->baseticks + (Uint32) ((float) manager->framecount * manager->rateticks);
00155 
00156         if (current_ticks <= target_ticks) {
00157                 the_delay = target_ticks - current_ticks;
00158                 SDL_Delay(the_delay);
00159         } else {
00160                 manager->framecount = 0;
00161                 manager->baseticks = SDL_GetTicks();
00162         }
00163         
00164         return time_passed;
00165 }
